messages.title: MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your own security and prosperity.

messages.title: THIS IS A UNIQUE AND CRUCIAL ELECTION FOR OUR COUNTRY
messages.content: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security. I believe that with dedication and hard work, we can make a success of Brexit and bring our country together - building a stronger economy that creates secure and well-paid jobs, where every child gets a good school place and working people can buy a home of their own.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring a successful Brexit that maintains national security and economic prosperity. Negotiating a strong outcome in Brussels to guarantee economic security and unite the country.

issues.brexitEurope: Ensuring a successful Brexit to maintain national security and prosperity. The choice at this election is clear: strong and stable leadership with Theresa May or a coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.
issues.economy: Negotiating Brexit is key to secure economic security and prosperity. Creating a strong economy with well-paid jobs.
issues.education: Ensuring every child gets a good school place.

housing.content: Working people can buy a home of their own.

quotes.text: Labour plots Brexit deal with other parties if Tories don't win election majority

images.caption: Theresa May and James Duddridge - Strong and stable leadership for Rochford and Southend East and for Britain.
A coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.
